packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

transfer(address,uint256).details: Uses lot selection based on sender's tax strategy (FIFO/LIFO/HIFO/LOFO)      Supports beforeTransfer hook for transfer taxes/fees

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Uses lot selection based on from address's tax strategy      Supports beforeTransfer hook for transfer taxes/fees

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfer tokens from sender to recipient

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer tokens from one address to another
